primevc.mvc.IMVCActor

type
interface
implements
IMVCNotifier
The MVCActor is an object that can communicate messages to the MVC-application but is also able to listen to messages from the application.

Instance Methods

isListening() : Bool

Method returning true if the actor is listening

startListening() : Void

Method in which the actor can begin to listen to events of the MVC

stopListening() : Void

Method in which the actor should stop listening to messages of the MVC
